body.string: {"api_version":1.7,"data":{"capabilities":{"subaccounts":false,"gear_sizes":["small","small.highcpu","medium","large"],"plan_upgrade_enabled":true,"private_ssl_certificates":true,"view_global_teams":false,"max_storage_per_gear":30},"consumed_gears":3,"created_at":"2014-12-01T15:50:28Z","currency_cd":"eur","email":"__openshift-online:user__","id":"547c8e445973ca306e0000ad","links":{"ADD_KEY":{"href":"https://openshift.redhat.com/broker/rest/user/keys","method":"POST","optional_params":[],"rel":"Add new SSH key","required_params":[{"description":"Name of the key","invalid_options":[],"name":"name","type":"string","valid_options":[]},{"description":"Type of Key","invalid_options":[],"name":"type","type":"string","valid_options":["ssh-rsa","ssh-dss","ssh-rsa-cert-v01@openssh.com","ssh-dss-cert-v01@openssh.com","ssh-rsa-cert-v00@openssh.com","ssh-dss-cert-v00@openssh.com"]},{"description":"The key portion of an ssh key (excluding key type and comment)","invalid_options":[],"name":"content","type":"string","valid_options":[]}]},"LIST_KEYS":{"href":"https://openshift.redhat.com/broker/rest/user/keys","method":"GET","optional_params":[],"rel":"List SSH keys","required_params":[]}},"login":"__openshift-online:user__","max_domains":3,"max_gears":16,"max_teams":15,"plan_expiration_date":null,"plan_id":"bronze","plan_quantity":1,"plan_state":"ACTIVE","usage_account_id":"32488930","usage_rates":{"prepaid":false,"storage":{"gigabyte":[{"min":0,"max":30,"usd":1.0,"cad":1.0,"eur":1.0,"duration":"month"}]}}},"messages":[],"status":"ok","supported_api_versions":[1.0,1.1,1.2,1.3,1.4,1.5,1.6,1.7],"type":"user","version":"1.7"}
